architecture.source: The foundational architecture of Solar Mini is based on a 32-layer Llama 2 structure

pre-trained_weights.source: and is initialized with pre-trained weights from Mistral 7B

size.source: The best model you’ll find under 30B

comparison_with_gpt_4.source: Solar Mini became the undisputed leader of all AI models on Hugging Face, surpassing every major model including GPT-4.

comparison_with_gpt_3_5.source: Using notably fewer parameters, Solar Mini delivers better responses than GPT-3.5

speed_comparison_with_gpt_3_5.source: and is at least 5 times faster

comparison_with_llama2.source: Solar Mini consistently outperformed every competitor like Llama2

comparison_with_mistral_7b.source: Solar Mini consistently outperformed every competitor like Mistral 7B

comparison_with_ko_alpaca.source: Solar Mini consistently outperformed every competitor like Ko-Alpaca

comparison_with_kullm.source: Solar Mini consistently outperformed every competitor like KULLM

optimization_for_rag_systems.source: Solar Mini is perfectly optimized for all RAG systems

method.source: How did Solar Mini Solar Mini stay compact, yet become remarkably ..., title: Introducing Solar Mini : Compact yet Powerful — Upstage, link: https://www.upstage.ai/feed/product/solarmini-performance-report

components.source: Inspired by recent efforts to efficiently up-scale LLMs, we present a method for scaling LLMs called depth up-scaling (DUS), which encompasses depthwise scaling and continued pretraining.
